name: Non Profit
description: Non-profit organizations, charities, or community groups supporting the local food and beverage industry.
benefits: Businesses aiming to position themselves as industry leaders and gain maximum exposure.
Access to monthly networking events and community outreach programs.
Subscription to the chamber’s newsletter with industry updates and trends.
Discounted rates on chamber-hosted workshops and seminars.
Opportunity to collaborate with the chamber on community initiatives and events.
One free ticket to the annual chamber gala or awards dinner.

name: Bronze
description: New or small businesses looking to establish connections and gain visibility.
benefits: Listing in the chamber’s online directory.
Access to monthly networking events.
Subscription to the chamber’s newsletter with industry updates and trends.
Discounted rates on chamber-hosted workshops and seminars.
Opportunity to participate in local business showcases.

name: Silver
description: Established businesses seeking to expand their reach and enhance their reputation.
benefits: All Basic Membership benefits.
Featured listing in the chamber’s directory with a business logo and description.
Two free tickets to the annual chamber gala or awards dinner.
Access to exclusive marketing opportunities, such as social media shoutouts.
Priority registration for chamber-sponsored events and trade shows.

name: Gold
description: Businesses aiming to position themselves as industry leaders and gain maximum exposure.
benefits: All Silver Membership benefits.
Prominent placement in the chamber’s marketing materials (e.g., website homepage, event banners).
Four free tickets to the annual chamber gala or awards dinner.
Opportunity to host or sponsor chamber events, gaining visibility.
Access to VIP roundtables with local policymakers and industry experts.
Complimentary admission to all chamber workshops and seminars.
